Load libraries
```{r}
library(pdftools)
require(knitr)
```

Set Working directory
```{r}
opts_knit$set(root.dir = '')
```

```{r}
pdf_file <- "../data/Macosko_2015.pdf"
info <- pdf_info(pdf_file)
#head(info)
```

```{r}
text <- pdf_text(pdf_file)
show(text)
```

```{r}
fonts <- pdf_fonts(pdf_file)
show(fonts)
```

```{r}
files <- pdf_attachments(pdf_file)
show(files)
```
